game.name: Spheromania
game.genres: Action, Free To Play, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound
game.shortDescription: Bounce, blast, and outlast in Spheromania. A fast-paced arena shooter where drones duel with blasters, mines, and mid-air hops. Manage your energy, dodge the shrinking arena, and be the last sphere hovering. Solo mode or online multiplayer.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bounce, blast, and outlast in Spheromania. A fast-paced arena shooter where drones duel with blasters, mines, and mid-air hops. Manage your energy, dodge the shrinking arena, and be the last sphere hovering. Solo mode or online multiplayer.
